data.title: Climate data (82010)
data.text:
Data reported by the weather station: 82010

Latitude: 40.95 | Longitude: -5.65 | Altitude: 787

Download climate data

Average climatic values ​​and annual totals

To calculate annual averages, we analyzed data of 360 days (98.36% of year).

If in the average or annual total of some data is missing information of 10 or more days, this is not displayed.

The total rainfall value 0 (zero) may indicate that there has been no such measurement and / or the weather station does not broadcast.

To calculate the average temperature used 7054 measurements.

To calculate the average wind speed used 7054 measurements.
